name: ASSASSINATION STATION
description: ASSASSINATION STATION is a dastardly difficult stealth pixel shooter featuring procedurally generated levels, a sky-high skill ceiling, competitive scoring system, and frenetic, smoke-smooth gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 160 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 160 MB available space
